Text:
Thanks ontotita!

Easiest/quickest install I could've hoped for! works perfectly... 
+1
it works on both my windows 7 64 bit op
Damn my credit card, get money in 10 days so just going to download it here for now and purchase it later =)

Some things seem bugged to me.
Heating doesn't work.
Reputation has no effect on your share in population. (I think it had, when i played it long time ago).

Are others suffering these bugs as well? Is it this copy bugged or it's win 64-bit's fault?
Has anyone else no matter what you change your windows to run the game with the colors are all distorted????? I have this problem with all new computers vista and windows 7.
Perfect download, works perfectly, youre a beast!
